full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI LAS BYANG DBANG CHEN DGYES PA'I ROL GAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,RTA MGRIN SKYER SGANG LUGS 'DI SNYE MO ZHU YAS KYI @006B GTER YIN, LAS KYANG SNGA 'GYUR GTZANG MA ZHIG CHER MI 'DUG PA DANG, GTER GZHUNG DNGOS CHA TSANG YANG DKON PAS, BLA MA'I DAG DANG RATNA GLING BA'I GSANG NAS RGYAN TE, TSOGS MCHOD MA GTOGS TSANG ZHING 'KHYER BDE DBANG CHEN DGYES PA'I ROL GAR ZHES PA 'DI'ANG RGYA BOD KYI YI GE'I RIGS DU MA DANG RI MO SOGS LA BLA GROS KYI RTZAS DANG LDAN ZHING TSUL BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I DRUNG YIG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS DANG, SNGAGS BAN BLO BZANG DON GRUB GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, MA DAG PA RNAMS BCOS TE, ZA HOR GYI BTZUN PA BZHAD PA RTZAL GYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU SBYAR,, ,,
